description: Non material amendment to ref: 21/04271/RE4 (as amended by 24/03469/NMA)  to allow amendment to the wording of condition 38 to: Prior to commencement of Phase 2 of development, a Whole Life-Cycle Carbon technical report should be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The report should assess all Operational (regulated and unregulated) and Embodied carbon emissions throughout the four modules of the project lifecycle according to 16 WLC Reduction Principles. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. INF: For the avoidance of doubt, Phase 2 of the development is shown on drawing 3736A-LB-00-XX-DR-A-102011 Rev P2 approved under application 24/04000/CND.
site_name: Upton Road And Raynham RoadLondonN18 2LJ
